TopicTitle: Planet Factory: Can I use in 1.0 or is there an alternative?

Articles.Content: I would really like to edit planets in the 1.0 KSP. If I can't then that's okay, I have planet factory working in the old version. I tried installing in the new version but nothing happened As far as I could tell Kragrathea isn't going to continue with that project so I wanted to ask if anybody has the scoop on planet editing in 1.0.
